name: react-native-country-picker
description: react-native-country-picker is a custom component that provides a modal allowing a user to select a country from a list. It display a flag next to each country name. Public domain flag images from FAMFAMFAM (http://www.famfamfam.com/lab/icons/flags/) that have been painstaki.
author: Xavier Carpentier <contact@xaviercarpentier.com> (http://xaviercarpentier.com/)
